dcterms:description: Public works contracts awarded in Italy between 2008 and 2014, providing detailed information about the type of contracting authority, the procedure and selection criterion used to award the contract, the number of bidders, and the identity of the winning bidder.
dcterms:title: Public works contracts awarded in Italy between 2008 and 2014

dcterms:creator: F. Decarolis
G. Palumbo
dcterms:description: The dataset used by Decarolis and Palumbo (2015) for empirical analysis of renegotiation of public contracts.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Decarolis and Palumbo (2015)

dcterms:creator: C. Guccio
G. Pignataro
I. Rizzo
dcterms:description: The dataset used by Guccio et al. (2012) to measure the efficient management of public works contracts.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Guccio et al. (2012)

dcterms:creator: M. Cavalieri
C. Guccio
I. Rizzo
dcterms:description: The dataset used by Cavalieri et al. (2019a) to assess the magnitude of cost overruns throughout the project life-cycle for Italian transport infrastructure projects.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Cavalieri et al. (2019a)

dcterms:creator: M. Finocchiaro Castro
C. Guccio
I. Rizzo
dcterms:description: The dataset used by Finocchiaro Castro et al. (2014) to assess the waste effects of corruption on infrastructure provision.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Finocchiaro Castro et al. (2014)

dcterms:creator: P. Bajari
S. Houghton
S. Tadelis
dcterms:description: The dataset used by Bajari et al. (2014) for empirical analysis of bidding for incomplete contracts.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Bajari et al. (2014)

dcterms:creator: P. Bogetoft
L. Kromann
dcterms:description: The dataset used by Bogetoft and Kromann (2018) to evaluate treatment effects using data envelopment analysis on matched samples.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Bogetoft and Kromann (2018)
